title: Enthralling Emerald & Diamond Bridal Haaram
materials: South Sea Pearls. Hyderabadi Kundan Setting.
features: A magnificent three-layer haaram featuring an intricate floral diamond design. The necklace showcases carefully selected emeralds strategically placed to enhance the piece's beauty. The pendant features a central square-cut emerald encompassed by diamonds and dangling South Sea pearls, adding a touch of traditional elegance. Meticulous Kundan craftsmanship for a regal appearance.
colors: Cream (Pearls). A classic and auspicious color combination.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. A statement piece for any special event where you want to make a lasting impression.
description: This haaram embodies the rich tradition of South Indian bridal jewelry, expertly handcrafted with modern diamond setting techniques. The use of natural Zambian emeralds signifies prosperity and good fortune. The lustrous South Sea pearls add a touch of sophistication. Its intricate design and high-quality materials ensure both beauty and longevity.
